title: Shen needs scale changes
body: Shen is a decent top laner and obvious tank but there are so many tank top laners that can have a serious output aswell, where as with shen he is limited to just just trying to make them tiered of beating his head in. while it is possiable to deal damage with shen using his passive he still doesnt do that much which is ok until some buys any life steal items then all shen can do is try not feed and hold the lane with zero kill potential unless your jungle camps you for the entire rest of the laning phase. i just feel like this could be fixed if Shen had any move that scales with items he buys not just all ap it cripples him in games please fix riot.

replies.body: Turn his passive down a second or two (or three) and he could actually become a viable damage/tank hybrid.
Also his passive scales off max HP I'm quite sure?
If you haven't tried AD Shen I highly suggest it, his damage goes insane if you get a slight lead in lane.
